name: Leighnor Aircraft LLC
about: Leighnor Aircraft LLC, based in Prescott, Arizona, was established in 2017 by Lance and Debbie Leighnor, continuing a legacy that dates back to the end of World War II. The company's heritage originates from "The Flying Leighnors," three Army Air Corps servicemen who founded a charter service and flight school in Hutchinson, Kansas, in 1946. Today, Leighnor Aircraft LLC offers FAA Part 61 flight instruction, aircraft rental, and discovery flights using a diverse fleet, including a Cessna 162 Skycatcher and a Redbird FMX flight simulator. With a strong commitment to aviation safety and maintenance, the company provides clean, well-maintained aircraft to the Prescott aviation community. Leighnor Aircraft LLC is dedicated to making flight training accessible and affordable, with multiple locations in Prescott and Cottonwood, and a team of experienced FAA-certified flight instructors.
